title: Episode 2: Dispatches From Day One
dc:creator: Martin Austermuhle, Martin Di Caro
description: The Metropocalypse crew is on the scene at the Ballston station in Virginia as the "new normal" takes effect. We also ask key questions of Metro's general manager and D.C.'s mayor, and we discuss what the end of late-night service means for everyday people.
itunes:subtitle: The Metropocalypse crew is on the scene at the Ballston station in Virginia as the new normal takes effect. We also ask key questions of Metros general manager and D.C.s mayor, and we discuss what the end of late-night service means for everyday people.
